{{Infobox Underground Item |name = Oval Stone |image = [[File:Oval_Stone_Updated.png|200px]] |caption = In-Game image of the ''Oval Stone''. |location =
*[[Underground]] *[[Rare Hold Items]] *[[Dungeons]] |value = 3 {{Diamonds}} }} ==Description== The '''Oval Stone''' is a type of [[Underground|Underground Item]]. ==Details== The '''Oval Stone''' has a value of 3 [[Diamonds]] {{Diamonds}} when sold. It can also be traded in Daily Deals. ==Mine Layout== The Oval Stone appears in the Underground as a 3x3 sized object.

[[File:OvalStoneMine.png|100px]] ==Acquisition== Max Revives can be found in the [[Underground]], as [[Rare Hold Items]] from [[File:Chansey.png|30px]] Chansey and [[File:Blissey.png|30px]] Blissey, and as Loot in [[Dungeons]]. ===Dungeons=== {{Loot/headâ€Ž|Underground Items}} {{LootItem|Rock Tunnel|1|N/A}} |} |}
